WRITING.TITLE: I need a new high capacity printer
WRITING.TEXT: that doesn't charge hundreds of dollars for new ink cartridges. I have a Konica Minolta Magicolor 4750DN and to replace everything (toner, ink, imaging units) costs more than a thousand dollars every 6 months. This is for less than 5,000 pages printed. Any thoughts?
But his ideologies ARE kind of reflected... Ender was never supposed to exist. The Wiggins had him so that they could procreate as their religion said they were supposed to.

WRITING.TITLE: Is it the best man's responsibility to finance the bachelor party, or does he typically split the cost with the whole crew?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm the best man at a wedding this fall and have the whole bachelor party planned, but it's expensive and as I've never done this before I don't know what the protocol is. Anyone have any experience?

WRITING.TITLE: Who's your favorite character in all of literature?
WRITING.TEXT: I found a list of the top 100 fictional characters of the last 100 years and I just don't know how they came up with them. Love to know your opinions.
